articles.title: ICC Test Rankings | Virat Kohli closes in on Smith’s no.1 spot; Bumrah drops out of Top 10 - SportsCafe
articles.description: On the back of an impressive 74 in Adelaide, Virat Kohli has closed in on Steve Smith at the top of the ICC’s Test batsman's rankings, with him now only 13 points shy of the Australian. Bumrah and Rahane, however, slipped out of the Top 10 of the batsman and …
articles.content: But while Kohli received good news, Cheteshwar Pujara, Ajinkya Rahane and Jasprit Bumrah all slipped in the rankings in their respective areas of strength. While Pujara and Rahane, both of whom faile… [+434 chars]
